import React, { Component } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import Navbar from '../Components/Navbar' import Title from '../Components/Title' import CardItems from '../Components/CardItems' import CVimage from '../cv.png' import CVBrianLynch from '../CVBrianLynch.pdf' /*This is the home page and makes use of the Navbar, homeNavConatiner, homeStatsContainer and TitleContainer components */ class CV extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { history: this.props.history } } render() { return (

What you get with MenuView

  • An Online menu, see examples.
  • Contactless Scan Sheet.
  • Contactless "Tap Tags".




What are Scan Sheets?

These are the A5 size sheets provided by us which will be placed at every table. This sheet will contain a QR code and a tap tag which link smartphones to the online menu.





What are Tap Tags?

Tap Tags link smart phones to the online menu simply by tapping a users smarthphone off the tag. It does this using NFC technology, the same technology used in contactless credit cards.

How To Use





Tap Smarthphone on the Tap Tag

Simply tap your smartphone off the Tap Tag which is on the Scan Sheet provided.



Or



Scan the QR code using smartphone

Simply scan the code using any QR scanner on any smartphone.
) } } export default CV
